name: get_user_tagged_media_by_user_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_looter.
Tool description: Access Instagram Data with Precision and Speed! Utilize Intelligent Request Filtering for Guaranteed 99.99% Response.
API description: Fetches the media in which an Instagram user is tagged by user ID.

is_id.description: The Instagram user ID whose tagged media is to be fetched.

count.description: The number of media items to fetch.

end_cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to None.
